title: Logan family escapes Queensland house fire
content:
A fire has destroyed the home of a family of nine south of Brisbane.

Five fire crews rushed to the property on the corner of Jacaranda and Camelia avenues, Logan Central, about 6.40pm on Wednesday and it took almost three hours to get the flames under control.

Five people were inside at the time and managed to escape without injury, but the property was destroyed. Stay informed. Like the Brisbane Times
